title: I'm running Android 10, I have never been able to get notification dots to show on messages. Hints?
content:
I have turned on every notification option I can find.
I downloaded the ios13 launcher and when I am running it I can get message notifications including a number like apple phones. 
I'm running Nova launcher prime which is supposed to include additional notifications.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
